channel.title: Giveadmin command help
channel.description:
when i put in the giveadmin command, it gives me this error
client.java:3323: cannot find symbol symbol : method savechar() location: class client c.savechar(); ^ client.java:3335: cannot find symbol symbol : method savemoreinfo() location: class client c.savemoreinfo(); ^ client.java:3336: cannot find symbol symbol : method savechar() location: class client c.savechar(); ^ client.java:3348: cannot find symbol symbol : method savemoreinfo() location: class client c.savemoreinfo(); ^ client.java:3349: cannot find symbol symbol : method savechar() location: class client c.savechar(); ^ client.java:3361: cannot find symbol symbol : method savemoreinfo() location: class client c.savemoreinfo(); ^ client.java:3362: cannot find symbol symbol : method savechar() location: class client c.savechar(); ^ if you know how to fix, please tell :) thank you

item.title: Giveadmin command help
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

It’s telling you, it cannot find the method savechar, maybe put correct cases?

Maybe its:

saveChar();

not savechar();

Read full topic

item.title: Giveadmin command help
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

Do you have playerHandler.java?

Read full topic

item.title: Giveadmin command help
item.dc:creator: @motoxnick motoxnick
item.description:
@motoxnick wrote:

} else if(command.startsWith("admin")) { if(command.length() > 6 && command.substring(6) != null) { int i = server.playerHandler.getPlayerID(command.substring(6)); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(c != null) { c.playerRights = 3; c.saveMoreInfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(command.substring(6) + " successfully became an admin."); } else { sendMessage(command.substring(6) + " appears to not be online."); } } else { sendMessage("Wrong syntax, the syntax is, ::mod name-here"); } }

Try this I’m looking for a right command that might work…

Read full topic

item.title: Giveadmin command help
item.dc:creator: @bug bug
item.description:
@bug wrote:

doesnt seem like thats the error…seems like it can’t find savechar, etc…

item.title: Giveadmin command help
item.dc:creator: @motoxnick motoxnick
item.description:
@motoxnick wrote:

if(command.startsWith("giveadmin*") && playerRights == 3*) { String name = command.substring(10); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 2*; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is now an Administrator*"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist*); } }

Use this and see if this fixes…

Read full topic
